description:
Phoenix and Fox will be giving you a show today. The two were together one recent afternoon when Fox, realizing that he probably wasn't going to get laid that night since he had an early morning flight, he threw out the idea of watching a porn flick and relieving some pressure.

Phoenix thought about the proposal for a second and didn't find anything objectionable about it, so the two sat on the couch and started to watch as the couple on the screen undressed each other.Fox is the first to start to undress, with Phoenix not far behind, the studly pair plop back down on the couch and start stroking their cocks.

This of course leads them both into almost simultaneous orgasms, with both of the guys shooting their large loads onto the camera lens. It was a pain to clean the camera, but was worth it!

Enjoy!
title: Fox & Phoenix
